mapper.select: SELECT MEETING_NAME, MEETING_PROFILE, INTRODUCE, MEETING_NUM, MEETING_HOBBY, MEETING_ADRESS FROM TEAMB_MEETING WHERE MEETING_NUM = #{meeting_Num}

SELECT USERID, JOIN_DATE FROM TEAMB_MEETING_MEMBER WHERE MEETING_NUM = #{meeting_Num} ORDER BY JOIN_DATE

mapper.select: SELECT MEETING_NUM FROM TEAMB_MEETING WHERE MEETING_NUM = ( SELECT MAX(MEETING_NUM) FROM TEAMB_MEETING)
mapper.update: UPDATE TEAMB_MEETING SET INTRODUCE = #{introduce}, MEETING_PROFILE = #{meeting_Profile}, MEETING_NAME = #{meeting_Name}, MEETING_ADRESS = #{meeting_Adress}, MEETING_HOBBY = #{meeting_Hobby} WHERE MEETING_NUM = #{meeting_Num}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TEAMB_APPOINTMENT WHERE MEETING_NUM = #{meeting_num} ORDER BY APPOINTMENT_NUM DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TEAMB_APPOINTMENT ( APPOINTMENT_NUM, TITLE, APPOINTMENT_DATE, APPOINTMENT_PLACE, CONTENTS, MAX_PEOPLE, WRITE_DATE, USERID, MEETING_NUM) VALUES ( #{appointment_num}, #{title}, #{appointment_date}, #{appointment_place}, #{contents}, #{max_people}, SYSDATE, #{userid}, #{meeting_num})
mapper.select: SELECT APPOINTMENT_NUM FROM TEAMB_APPOINTMENT WHERE APPOINTMENT_NUM = ( SELECT MAX(APPOINTMENT_NUM) FROM TEAMB_APPOINTMENT)
mapper.update: UPDATE TEAMB_APPOINTMENT SET TITLE = #{title}, APPOINTMENT_DATE = #{appointment_date}, APPOINTMENT_PLACE = #{appointment_place}, CONTENTS = #{contents}, MAX_PEOPLE = #{max_people} WHERE APPOINTMENT_NUM = #{appointment_num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TEAMB_PARTICIPANTS (MEETING_NUM, APPOINTMENT_NUM, PARTICIPANTS_NUM, USERID) VALUES ( #{meeting_num}, #{appointment_num}, #{participants_num}, #{userid})
mapper.select: SELECT MEETING_NUM, APPOINTMENT_NUM, PARTICIPANTS_NUM, USERID FROM TEAMB_PARTICIPANTS WHERE APPOINTMENT_NUM = #{appointment_num} ORDER BY PARTICIPANTS_NUM
SELECT PARTICIPANTS_NUM FROM TEAMB_PARTICIPANTS WHERE PARTICIPANTS_NUM = (SELECT MAX(PARTICIPANTS_NUM) FROM TEAMB_PARTICIPANTS)
